content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35.5, y=-86.5)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), (37.0,-85.0)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)

###Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0)
- 2 Stone furnaces at positions (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0)
- 4 Burner inserters at positions (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5), (-28.5,-57.5), (-22.5,-56.5)
- 2 Wooden chests at positions (-27.5,-59.5), (-24.5,-58.5)

###Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for item handling
- Transport belt system connecting components

###Smelting Array at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for input/output
- Transport belt system for item distribution

###Power Generation System at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing pipes in occupied spaces
- Check if target location is clear before placing pipes
- Ensure there is enough space around existing entities for new pipe placement

### Errors in fluid connections
- Make sure pipe networks are properly connected end-to-end
- Verify that fluid producer (pump) and consumer (boiler) connection points are properly aligned
- Check that there are no gaps in the pipe network between components

### Entity placement obstruction errors
- Scan area for existing entities before placing new ones
- Consider removing blocking entities if they interfere with critical infrastructure
